nnye: letsatsi lamorago ga ngwaga la segopotso sa tiragalo nngwe
a o nyetse kgotsa ga o a nyala
A o santse o le foo?
A o santse o le teng?
mokgwa wa go itshetsa le tswelelopele
dikakanyo tse ditala tse d se nang mmala di robetse ka natla
go ya tirong le go boela gae ka gale
o ntse o ya jang gompieno
o na le dingwaga tse kae
maitiso a gago a ne a le jang

a little: I don't understand what you mean
nnye: Ga ke tlhaloganye gore o raya jang
ke a go rata le nna
go ithuta o le mo tirong
sa bofelo mme se e se gore ga se mosola

a little: many many happy returns of the day
nnye: nna le letsatsi le le monate le le segofetseng
go sa ntse go le jalo
na le maikutlo a a sa siamang

a little: My hovercraft is full of eels
nnye: Hovakherafote ya me e tletse ditlhapidikanoga
se ke wa bo wa ineela
ke itumelela go kopana le wena
se se sa tlholeng se dirisiwa
puo e le esi ga e kake ya lekana

a little: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.
nnye: Maikaelelo a rona: go kgontsha batho botlhe, gongwe le gongwe go tlhaloganya lefatshe le go tlhagisa dikakanyo tsa bone go ralala dipuo.

a little: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
nnye: Maikaelelo a rona: go rulaganya tshedimosetso ya lefatshe le go dira gore e fitlhelesege le go nna mosola mo lefatsheng ka bophara.
leoto la sefofane le le babalesegileng
ke tla go bona mo bogautshwaneng
ya kwa pele le kwa morago

a little: Thank you for your patience while we investigate shipment
nnye: Re lebogela bopelotelele fa re ntse re batlisisa thoto e e rometsweng
Re lebogela fa o dirisitse epo ya rona

a little: what are you doing right now
what do you do for a living
